column.name: TX
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '<font color=red>在底稿系统中完成“反馈阶段”底稿上传工作，并在本系统中完成首次申报签章流程后，才能发起反馈意见回复流程<font>'

column.name: TX2
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '<font color=red>在底稿系统中完成“问询阶段”底稿上传工作，并在本系统中完成首次申报签章流程后，才能发起反馈意见回复流程<font>'

column.name: ZYLDYJ
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var varSrc="/bss/ibb/nworkflow/page/suggestion.sdo?LcbdID="+ID+"&Lcbd=lcIB_FKYJHFB";
"<iframe id='lc_zyldyj' frameborder='0' width='100%' height='100%' scrolling='no' src='"+varSrc+"'></iframe>"

constraint.SQL:
["EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ECIF.lcIB_NHSP T WHERE T.HYJG = 0 AND T.XMMC = tIB_XMXX.ID)
and NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ECIF.lcIB_FKYJHFB T,JGCRM.OS_WFENTRY WF
 WHERE XMMC = tIB_XMXX.ID 
								 AND WF.ID = T.INSTID
									AND WF.STATE = 1)

and tIB_XMXX.XMFL=1
OR ID = {0}",[{"expression":"XMMC.ID","scale":0,"length":0,"type":1}]]

column.name: DGFKJDSCBL
column.describe: 底稿反馈阶段上传比例

column.name: DGWXJDSCBL
column.describe: 底稿问询阶段上传比例

column.name: BJDBR
column.describe: 签字人(保荐代表人/主办人)

column.name: NHBZS
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select t1.NHZY_ZS from ECIF.lcIB_NHSP t1 inner join jgcrm.os_wfentry t2 on t2.id=t1.instid where t2.state=4 and t1.XMMC=? and rownum = 1 order by t1.instid desc",[XMMC])

column.name: SHXT
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var i = ABS_LOADBEAN('com.apex.bss.mod.ibb.systemdocking.apexsoft.livebosbean.PageJumpToAms');
//var url=i.getLivebosPageUrl('admin','tIB_ZSHRW','tIB_ZSHRW_XJRW','');
var url=i.getCompleteUrl($Login.User.UserID,'/bss/ams/page/index.sdo#task')
 '<input type="button" onclick=\'window.open("'+url+'")\' value="审核系统" />'
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0

column.name: SFCJYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0 && SFCJYJ==null
column.disable-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0

column.name: ZKBSHYJ1
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0||SFCJYJ != 1

column.name: ZKBSHYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0||SFCJYJ != 1

column.name: ZKBDGYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0||SFCJYJ != 1

column.name: DGYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0||SFCJYJ != 1

column.name: ZKBQTYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0||SFCJYJ != 1

column.name: QTYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0||SFCJYJ != 1

column.name: ZKBSHYJHZ
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var cnt1= ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam  where paramname='ams.system'");
var cnt2 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.lcIB_FKYJHFB_ZKBSHYJHZ where lcIB_FKYJHFB_ID=?",[ID]);
(cnt1==0&&cnt2==0)||( cnt1==1 && SFCJYJ==null)

column.name: BZSM
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '
“请确保上传的附件与公文正文中列示的文件保持一致”、“该附件框中每一附件类型中仅上传一份最新版本附件至协同平台，用户可新增附件类型行”'

column.name: DBXZ
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var url='/gdlcDown?lcbdid='+ID+'&insid='+InstID+'&fjlx=1'+'&yhid='+$Login.User; '' //'下载'

column.name: FYYBCWJ
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> O_THIS.getColumn("FYYBCWJ").setLabel("非用印备查文件
(不上传至OA)");

column.name: OASPXX
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var oaid=ABS_SQLVALUE("select nvl(max(oaworkflowid),0) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where lcbd='lcIB_FKYJHFB' and lcbdid=?",[ID])
var varSrc="/bss/ibb/nworkflow/page/oAsuggestion.sdo?oaWorkId="+oaid+"&lcbd=lcIB_FKYJHFB&lcbdId="+ID;
"<iframe id='lc_oayj' frameborder='0' width='100%' height='100%' scrolling='no' src='"+varSrc+"'></iframe>"
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var oaid=ABS_SQLVALUE("select nvl(max(oaworkflowid),0) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where lcbd='lcIB_FKYJHFB' and lcbdid=?",[ID])
oaid<=0
